institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 31 (Affiliation of Athletes Participating in Domestic Competitions)
contents: Article 31 (Organization of Athletes Participating in Domestic Competitions) ① When an athlete participating in domestic competitions submits an application as an affiliated organization, a letter of recommendation from the organization he/she has been working for (studying or residing in) for more than 3 consecutive months as of the application deadline (National Competitions Attachment No. 15) Form, local convention attached form No. 16) and separate documents proving actual employment (enrollment, residing) must be submitted when submitting the application. However, for schools under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act and the Higher Education Act, schools established under special laws, public vocational training facilities under the Workers' Vocational Competency Development Act, military personnel, and players affiliated with public institutions, the period of employment (enrollment, incarceration) and separate documents are required. You can submit your participation application regardless. Revised 2019. 4. 9., 2021. 1. 8., ② When an athlete participating in a domestic competition wishes to change his or her organization, he or she must submit a recommendation for change of affiliation (Form No. 17) at least 10 days before the competition start date. . Revised 2021. 1. 8.
